subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}

{{liushu|p}} – a lid on top of a container, with content in.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: All the pronunciations are ultimately cognate, derived from a root meaning "to join, to come together ~ to meet, to gather ~ to match, to fit ~ to understand". Perhaps related to {{och-l|合|to match}} ~ {{och-l|蓋|lid}}.
